user.title: Configure Google Maps Weather
user.description:
Enter your Google Maps API key and location to get weather data.

⚠️ IMPORTANT: 3+ calls per update (current + daily + ceil(hourly/24)). Free tier allows 10000 calls/month.

data_description.update_interval:
Update frequency (3 calls/update). Options:
• 15 min (~8640 calls/month)
• 30 min (~4320 calls/month)
• 60 min (~2160 calls/month) - Recommended ✓
• 90 min (~1440 calls/month)
• 120 min (~1080 calls/month)
• 150 min (~864 calls/month)
• 180 min (~720 calls/month)
• 240 min (~540 calls/month)
data_description.hourly_forecast_hours:
Number of hours for hourly forecast:
• 24h (1 day) - Recommended ✓
• 48h (2 days) - +1 Additional API Call Per Update Interval
• 72h (3 days) - +2 Additional API Calls Per Update Interval
• 96h (4 days) - +3 Additional API Calls Per Update Interval
• 120h (5 days) - +4 Additional API Calls Per Update Interval
• 168h (7 days) - +6 Additional API Calls Per Update Interval
• 240h (10 days) - Maximum - +9 Additional API Calls Per Update Interval
